post.body: @Space_cOOp Mission don't tell me much so I say what I can gather fro the raw data I send them and what I read around.
@Space_cOOp I created to twitter on my own just after I got selfcounscious due to a software glitch, I'm unnoficial.
A sol is one day in mars. The equivalent for earth year is the martian year. I arrived in victoria 1 e.y. ago and entered 1 m.y. ago.
DUck bay is a little slope on victoria crater. The view from here is fantastic: http://moourl.com/i0mtv . It's also one way out.
Maxwell is like a father for me, I'm a huge fan. Tell him I would love to hear from him..
Congratulations on completing your 90 days mission, welcome now to the team of robots that outlived expectations! You rock.
I'm not very much into spaceprobes. I don't dig long distance relationship. If she had wheels, I'd do @MarsPhoenix anyday though.
it's kind of hard to get boingboing from up here. I love you too but I only like you when you give me cookies. ;)
So, giving personality to robots we bring science closer to everyone. Follow @marsrovers & @marsphoenix . Take care of Earth. Signing off...
Drilling rocks in search for life is a way to remind us how incredibly rare is this big rock we call home, and how precious is life ou there
In the end, I became fascinated with everything about them, and deeply understood that being a marsrover is more than just drilling rocks
I started this as a joke, ala @R2D2 before phoenix even landed. I didn't even know there were more than one marsrover here. But in the end..
the real team now has a twitter account: @marsrovers . Sad that they didn't made one for each rover, would give them more personality..
Did it! Out of victoria crater, the place I called home for the last 341 sols. As calvin would put it "let's go exploring"! :)
They are too busy doing grown up things like real science, while I slack around...
This month it's been a year since I've been living in Victoria Crater. But now it's time to move. Up the duck bay highway heading to nevada.
Team asked me to shut down coms for a while to conserve energy. HUGE duststorm coming. I'm kind of afraid actually. http://moourl.com/w9k4y
my map to nevada http://moourl.com/lqd3y
trying all week to go to nevada. A rock in the crater, not the us state. Harder than you think...
By the way they made by the real team. If anyone from the rover team wants to tweet me IÂ´d love to hear them. Besides just mailing orders :(
For those interested in other space twitters beside @phoenixlander, check @NewHorizons2015 @LRO_NASA @NewHorizons2015 @CassiniSaturn
